subScenes.name: 初次问候
subScenes.description: 客户到达时热情打招呼并表达欢迎

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! You must be Ms. Chen from ABC Corp?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您好！您一定是来自ABC公司的陈女士吧？

responses.text: Yes, that's me! Thanks for having me.
responses.text_cn: 是的，是我！谢谢您的接待。

responses.text: You got it! I'm Chen. Really appreciate you coming to pick me up.
responses.text_cn: 没错，我就是陈。太感谢您来接我了。

responses.text: Yep, Chen here.
responses.text_cn: 对，我就是陈。

qaPairs.usageNote: 首次见面用肯定语气+感谢，建立好感

qaPairs.speakerText: Welcome to our office! How was your trip?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 欢迎来到我们公司！旅途怎么样？

responses.text: It was smooth, thanks! The train was on time.
responses.text_cn: 很顺利，谢谢！火车很准时。

responses.text: Not bad at all! A bit tiring, but the views were great.
responses.text_cn: 还不错！有点累，但风景很棒。

responses.text: Fine, thanks.
responses.text_cn: 还行，谢谢。

qaPairs.usageNote: 回答旅途问题时加细节更显真诚

subScenes.name: 提供招待
subScenes.description: 为客户提供茶水或咖啡等基本招待

qaPairs.speakerText: Can I get you a coffee or maybe some tea?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我给您倒杯咖啡或茶好吗？

responses.text: Coffee would be great, thanks — black, if possible.
responses.text_cn: 咖啡就好，谢谢，不加奶。

responses.text: Actually, I'm good with water, but thanks for offering!
responses.text_cn: 其实水就行，不过还是谢谢您！

responses.text: Tea, please.
responses.text_cn: 来杯茶吧。

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确偏好避免反复询问，提升效率

qaPairs.speakerText: We've got cookies and fruit too — feel free to grab something.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们还有饼干和水果，随便拿点吃吧。

responses.text: Oh, that's so kind! I'll take a cookie, thanks.
responses.text_cn: 太贴心了！我拿块饼干吧，谢谢。

responses.text: No thanks, I'm good — just the coffee's perfect.
responses.text_cn: 不用了，我就喝咖啡就好。

responses.text: Sure, I'll grab an apple.
responses.text_cn: 好，我拿个苹果。

qaPairs.usageNote: 婉拒时仍表达感谢，保持礼貌

subScenes.name: 引导入室
subScenes.description: 引导客户前往会议室并确认会议安排

qaPairs.speakerText: Let me show you to the meeting room — your team's already here.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我带您去会议室，您的团队已经到了。

responses.text: Perfect! I'm glad they made it okay.
responses.text_cn: 太好了！很高兴他们顺利到了。

responses.text: Awesome, thanks! Is this the main conference room?
responses.text_cn: 太棒了，谢谢！这是主会议室吗？

responses.text: Okay, let's go.
responses.text_cn: 好，走吧。

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应时可确认地点，体现专业关注

qaPairs.speakerText: We've got the projector set up and your agenda on the table.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 投影仪已经准备好了，您的议程也放在桌上。

responses.text: That's so thoughtful — you've really thought of everything!
responses.text_cn: 太周到了，你们什么都想到了！

responses.text: Great, thanks. Everything looks ready.
responses.text_cn: 很好，谢谢，一切准备好了。

responses.text: Cool.
responses.text_cn: 不错。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体赞美增强客户体验感

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别
subScenes.description: 会议前简短告别并表达后续支持

qaPairs.speakerText: I'll leave you to get settled — I'll be back in 10 minutes with the team.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我先不打扰您了，10分钟后带团队回来。

responses.text: Thanks so much — I really appreciate your help!
responses.text_cn: 非常感谢您的帮助！

responses.text: No worries! Take your time.
responses.text_cn: 别客气，慢慢来。

responses.text: Got it.
responses.text_cn: 好的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达感谢能显著提升客户好感度

qaPairs.speakerText: If you need anything before we start — water, extra pens, etc. — just let me know.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 会议开始前若需要什么，比如水或笔，随时告诉我。

responses.text: I'm all set, but thanks for asking!
responses.text_cn: 我都准备好了，谢谢关心！

responses.text: Actually, could I get a glass of water?
responses.text_cn: 其实能给我一杯水吗？

responses.text: Okay, will do.
responses.text_cn: 好，我知道了。

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提出需求显得自然不拘谨
